event.description: Jimmy Rollins flies out to left fielder Chris Duncan.
Shane Victorino homers (4) on a line drive to right center field.
Raul Ibanez pops out to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Ryan Howard strikes out swinging.
Jayson Werth strikes out swinging.
Pedro Feliz strikes out swinging.
Miguel Cairo singles on a fly ball to left fielder Chris Duncan.
Carlos Ruiz strikes out swinging.
Brett Myers singles on a fly ball to center fielder Colby Rasmus.
Jimmy Rollins doubles (5) on a fly ball to left fielder Chris Duncan. Brett Myers to 3rd.
Shane Victorino doubles (5) on a fly ball to left fielder Chris Duncan. Brett Myers scores. Jimmy Rollins scores.
Raul Ibanez singles on a ground ball to right fielder Ryan Ludwick. Shane Victorino to 3rd.
Ryan Howard walks. Raul Ibanez to 2nd.
Jayson Werth flies into a sacrifice double play, center fielder Colby Rasmus to second baseman Skip Schumaker. Shane Victorino scores. Raul Ibanez out at 2nd.
Pedro Feliz lines out to second baseman Skip Schumaker.
Miguel Cairo flies out to right fielder Ryan Ludwick.
Carlos Ruiz pops out to second baseman Skip Schumaker.
Brett Myers grounds out, shortstop Tyler Greene to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Jimmy Rollins singles on a ground ball to right fielder Ryan Ludwick.
Shane Victorino singles on a ground ball to left fielder Chris Duncan. Jimmy Rollins to 3rd.
With Raul Ibanez batting, Shane Victorino picked off and caught stealing 2nd base, pitcher Adam Wainwright to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Raul Ibanez strikes out swinging.
Ryan Howard walks.
Jayson Werth homers (4) on a fly ball to left field. Jimmy Rollins scores. Ryan Howard scores.
Pedro Feliz grounds out, first baseman Albert Pujols to pitcher Adam Wainwright.
Miguel Cairo flies out to center fielder Colby Rasmus.
Carlos Ruiz grounds out, third baseman Joe Thurston to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Brett Myers grounds out, second baseman Skip Schumaker to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Khalil Greene remains in the game as the shortstop.
Defensive switch from shortstop to second base for Tyler Greene.
Pitching Change: Dennys Reyes replaces Adam Wainwright, batting 9th.
Jimmy Rollins strikes out swinging.
Shane Victorino singles on a line drive to left fielder Chris Duncan.
Raul Ibanez hit by pitch. Shane Victorino to 2nd.
Ryan Howard singles on a line drive to center fielder Colby Rasmus. Shane Victorino scores. Raul Ibanez to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Chris Perez replaces Dennys Reyes, batting 9th.
Jayson Werth hit by pitch. Ryan Howard to 2nd.
Pedro Feliz singles on a ground ball to first baseman Albert Pujols. Raul Ibanez scores. Ryan Howard to 3rd. Jayson Werth to 2nd.
Miguel Cairo grounds into a double play, second baseman Tyler Greene to shortstop Khalil Greene to first baseman Albert Pujols. Pedro Feliz out at 2nd.
Carlos Ruiz singles on a line drive to right fielder Ryan Ludwick.
Eric Bruntlett ground bunts into a force out, pitcher Chris Perez to shortstop Khalil Greene. Carlos Ruiz out at 2nd. Eric Bruntlett to 1st.
Defensive switch from third base to second base for Joe Thurston.
Pitching Change: Jason Motte replaces Chris Perez, batting 8th.
Defensive Substitution: Brian Barden replaces pitcher Chris Perez, batting 9th, playing third base.
Jimmy Rollins flies out to right fielder Ryan Ludwick.
With Shane Victorino batting, Eric Bruntlett advances to 2nd on a balk.
Shane Victorino strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Brad Thompson replaces Jason Motte, batting 8th.
Raul Ibanez hits a ground-rule double (7) on a fly ball to left field.
Ryan Howard grounds out, first baseman Albert Pujols to pitcher Brad Thompson. Raul Ibanez to 3rd.
Jayson Werth reaches on a fielder's choice out, pitcher Brad Thompson to catcher Yadier Molina. Raul Ibanez out at home.
Pedro Feliz doubles (5) on a pop up to second baseman Joe Thurston. Jayson Werth scores.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Matt Stairs replaces Ryan Madson.
Matt Stairs lines out to second baseman Joe Thurston.
Skip Schumaker lines out to third baseman Pedro Feliz.
